auth.loginDescription: Get started by logging in with your YouTube account!

status.disableStreamerModeDescription: Show all hidden elements of the extension until you reload the page.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.noReactionsYet: There are no reactions for this video yet.
analytics.ctaCreator: Get Creator+ to see more analytics

markReaction.title: Untracked Reaction?
markReaction.intro: If this video is a reaction to another type of content, you can help use by providing information.
markReaction.description: If this video is or contains a reaction to another video, you can mark it as this.
markReaction.disclaimer: Please note that every submission will be manually reviewed before being listed.

reactionPolicy.title: Reaction Policy
reactionPolicy.notSet: The Content Creator has not set conditions for reactions.
reactionPolicy.notSetOwn: You have not not set conditions for reactions.

status.reactUpToPercentage: You may only react to {{value}}% of this video

reactionHistory.title: Reaction History
reactionHistory.noReactionsYet: There are no reactions for this video yet.
reactionHistory.ctaCreator: Get Creator+ to see who reacted to your video
reactionHistory.ctaViewer: Get Viewer+ to see if followed streamers reacted

submitSuggestion.title: Suggestion
submitSuggestion.intro: Send this video as a suggestion to your favorite streamers.
submitSuggestion.description: You can submit the currently playing video as a suggestion for any streamer.

results.pending: Start typing the creator name to search
results.empty: The creator is not signed up or has disabled video suggestions
